DRAW_1_MSG: Você só pode comprar 1 cartão por vez!
ENTER_POINTS_TO_WIN: Insira a quantidade de pontos para ganhar.
LOADING_SET_PROMPT:
Would you like to load this set?

%s
NEW_GAME_PROMPT:
Would you like to start a new game?
3DEins isn't fully implemented right now.
NUMBER_CARD: Just a normal card, without special cases.
PLAYER_BREAK:
%s needs to take a break.
%s: Continue!
PLUS2_CARD:
The next Player needs to draw 2 cards.
This card can be countered with another Plus 2 or Plus 4 card.
QUIT_GAME: Would you like to quit this game?
REFRESH: Press Start to Refresh the Cardset list.
RESTART_GAME:
Would you like to restart the game?

You will lose your current progress!
REVERSE_CARD:
Changes the play direction on 3+ Player.
2 Player: Current Player can continue.
SKIP_CARD:
The next Player cannot play for the next round on 3+ Player.
2 Player: Current Player can continue.
STATS_INFO: Press  |  to go to the Game Statistics.
UNIVERSAL_CORE: For Universal-Core which is used with the 3DS App.
WILD_CARD: The current Player can choose a color.
WILD_DRAW4_CARD:
The next Player needs to draw 4 Cards.
The current Player can choose a color.
This card can be countered with another Plus 4 card.
